message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to discuss the product with you! I think it's a great opportunity for you to acquire this valuable item. I'm willing to offer it to you for $12000.
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate the value of the product, but I believe we can find a price that works for both of us. I would like to propose a counteroffer of $10000.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. However, I'm still looking to get a better price for the product. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer it to you for $11500.
Thank you for adjusting your offer, Alice. I appreciate your flexibility. I would like to counter with a price of $10750.
Thank you for your latest offer, Bob. I'm still looking to get a better price for the product. I'm willing to compromise further and offer it to you for $11200.
Thank you for your continued negotiation, Alice. I appreciate your efforts. I would like to counter with a price of $10900.
Thank you for your latest offer, Bob. I'm still looking to get a better price for the product. I'm willing to make one more concession and offer it to you for $11000.
Thank you for your final offer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. I would like to counter with a price of $10850.
I'm sorry, Bob, but I've already reached my limit for concessions. I'm not willing to go any lower than $11000. If you're willing to meet me at that price, I'll consider it.
